      • rotate

        public static void rotate(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lists)
        This method rotates the given table.
        Parameters:

      • displayData

        public static void displayData(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lists,
                               int press)
        This method is used to display the data stored in Database. This method has two options for display. Either display with full names or display stopped by dots.
        Parameters:
        lists - Given table to display.
        press - Integer value of option provided from user.

      • removeLine

        public static void removeLine(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lists)
        This method is used to remove a line from the table processing. Dynamically asks the user which line wants to remove.
        Parameters:
        lists - Table processing.

      • removeColumn

        public static void removeColumn(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lists)
        Similar to removeLine, removeColumn is responsible for removing a Column from the table.
        Parameters:
        lists - Table processing.

      • changeData

        public static void changeData(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> lists,
                              java.lang.String cell)
        This method is used to change the data stored in a specific cell of the table.
        Parameters:
        lists - Table Processing.
        cell - String value of the specific cell user wants to change.

      • isNumber

        public static boolean isNumber(java.lang.String data)
        isNumber examines whether a string value is basically a number.
        Parameters:
        data - String user wants to examine.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the string given is a number, else returns false.
